CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The best PCE value of 6.33% was obtained from the blend device of PBDTT-DPP75-TPD25 and [6,6]-phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) , with a short - circuit current density ( J SC ) higher than 16 mA / cm^2.

Let's think step by step.

1. PBDTT-DPP75-TPD25 - This is a "Material Name" as it refers to a specific blend device material.
2. [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester - This is also a "Material Name" as it refers to another material used in the blend device.

Therefore, the two "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are PBDTT-DPP75-TPD25 and [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDTT-DPP75-TPD25 |
| [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The best PCE value of 6.33% was obtained from the blend device of PBDTT-DPP75-TPD25 and [6,6]-phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) , with a short - circuit current density ( J SC ) higher than 16 mA / cm^2.

Let's think step by step.

1. "PCE value" is a property related to the performance of a solar cell, where PCE stands for "power conversion efficiency."
2. "6.33%" is the specific value of the PCE.
3. "blend device" is a type of solar cell device made by blending two materials together.
4. "PBDTT-DPP75-TPD25" is one of the materials used in the blend device.
5. "PC71BM" is the other material used in the blend device.
6. "short-circuit current density ( JSC )" is a property related to the flow of electrical current in a solar cell.
7. "higher than 16 mA / cm^2" is the specific value of the JSC.

Therefore, the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

* PCE value
* blend device
* short-circuit current density ( JSC )
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

* PCE value
* short-circuit current density ( JSC )

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE value |
| short-circuit current density ( JSC ) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The best PCE value of 6.33% was obtained from the blend device of PBDTT-DPP75-TPD25 and [6,6]-phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) , with a short - circuit current density ( J SC ) higher than 16 mA / cm^2.

Let's think step by step.

1. "PCE value of 6.33%" is a "Property Value" entity.
2. "short-circuit current density (J SC) higher than 16 mA / cm^2" is also a "Property Value" entity.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are "PCE value of 6.33%" and "short-circuit current density (J SC) higher than 16 mA / cm^2".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. "PCE value of 6.33%" is a Value of Material Property entity.
2. "short-circuit current density (J SC) higher than 16 mA / cm^2" is also a Value of Material Property entity.

Therefore, the Value of Material Property entities in the paragraph are "PCE value of 6.33%" and "short-circuit current density of 16 mA / cm^2" (I have simplified the second entity to remove the qualifier "higher than", as it is not relevant to the value itself).

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCE value of 6.33% |
| short-circuit current density (J SC) of 16 mA / cm^2 |
